Each location may host its training programs for anyone who wants to learn and become a subject matter expert in a particular domain. Ask your resource manager about the current programs specific to your location. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Here we’d like to tell you about \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCJSCC/The+Rolling+Scopes+School\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"RS School\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":7968,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/42dbfe1c-ab78-4299-a0c9-153bcd2ba7dc/2_fix.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/42dbfe1c-ab78-4299-a0c9-153bcd2ba7dc/2_fix.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"2_fix.png\",\"name\":\"2_fix.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"42dbfe1c-ab78-4299-a0c9-153bcd2ba7dc\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":246.17224880382776},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In collaboration with the Rolling Scopes community, we provide free training for anyone who wants to master the profession of a front-end developer. Our associates serve as \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCJSCC/Mentoring+RS+School\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"mentors\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and train more than 6 thousand people per year. Some of yesterday's RS mentees then join us to become our new team members. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
